newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia's Fahey says budget to aid rates.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia's Fahey says budget to aid rates.

text.p: Australian Finance Minister John Fahey said on a Wednesday that the Federal budget would increase national savings and put downward pressure on interest rates.

Asked by reporters if there was room for further interest rate cuts, Fahey said: "That's a matter for the Reserve Bank, but what the budget does do, it increases national savings and that puts downward pressure on interest rates. It certianly gives a base for that to occur."
The government announced on Tuesday it would make A$3.9 billon of budget cuts to produce an underlying budget deficit in the year to June 30, 1997 of A$5.65 billion.
